ygData.subject: Re: Clarity
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have no clue about the enchanter clarity stacking with bard s but I do know bard s clarity stack with each other. My main char is a necro and I was
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have no clue about the enchanter clarity stacking with bard's but I
do know bard's clarity stack with each other. My main char is a necro and I
was grouped with 3 bards in Sol B doing kobolds andthe impact on my mana
regen was astonishing. I didn't even have to meditate and we were pulling
just about non stop. So yes bards clarity does stack.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: Eqbards@... <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 4:10 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Clarity


>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>Being a newly 32nd bard I'm getting hit with various questions and claims
>regarding my 32nd level Clarity song. I have read previously on this list
>that our song does stack with an Enchanter's Clarity spell. Does anyone
>have hard number with what percentage increase there is? Is it in fact
>Enchanter Clarity + Bard Clarity? The one thing that I've been told that I
>had no previous knowledge of is that Bard Clarity stacks with Bard Clarity.
>Is this so? If so, is it Bard Clarity + Bard Clarity, or a lesser
>percentage of increase. What about three or more bards in a group, etc.?
>
>Crier Sharpsong
>EverQuest - Pretend it's a game.
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
